meanings.definition: Belonging as a part, right, or attribute.
meanings.sent1: The appertaining documents were crucial for the case.
meanings.sent2: The appertaining laws must be followed by all citizens.
meanings.sent3: The appertaining key unlocked the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was appertaining to her generous nature.
meanings.sent5: The appertaining colors of the painting brought it to life.

meanings.definition: To relate to or be connected with.
meanings.sent1: The new evidence appertaining to the crime was found.
meanings.sent2: The responsibilities appertaining to the job were clearly outlined.
meanings.sent3: The gossip appertaining to the neighbors was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His success appertained to his hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The emotions appertaining to the situation were overwhelming.
